message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your split seems unfair to me, let's meet in the middle. I need you to be happy with the deal so we can close it this round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my revised offer.
Alice, this is cutting it close. We're both losing money with each round. Take this offer so we can both walk away with something substantial.
